abstract: Microsoft’s $1.2 billion acquisition of Fast Search and Transfer, the Norwegian enterprise search vendor, may bolster its technology and its relationships with big companies and Web publishers.
snippet: Microsoft’s $1.2 billion acquisition of Fast Search and Transfer, the Norwegian enterprise search vendor, may bolster its technology and its relationships with big companies and Web publishers.
lead_paragraph: Now here is a deal from Microsoft that, at least on the face, makes some sense.

headline.main: A FAST Deal for Microsoft Search
